sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: STEPHANOPHORUS, in Antiquity, the chief priest of Pallas, who presided over the rest It was usual for every god to have a chief priest ; that of Pallas was the Stephanophorus, and that of Hercules was called Dadouchus. Stephanophorus was also a priest who assisted the women in the celebration of the festival Thesmophoria.
